programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Born and raised in Brooklyn, N.Y., Rob Christensen joins a crew and sells drugs to fit in; to escape that lifestyle, he joins the Air Force, goes to college and finds stand-up, a discovery that changes his life.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: 42, (2013, History)
programme.desc: In 1946, Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford), general manager of the Brooklyn Dodgers, signs Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) to the team in defiance of major league baseball's notorious color barrier.

programme.title: Eight Men Out, (1988, History)
programme.desc: Disgruntled Chicago White Sox stand trial for allegedly throwing the 1919 World Series for mobster Arnold Rothstein (Michael Lerner).

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: The ruler of the future tells best friends Bill and Ted they must compose a new song to save life as we know it. But instead of writing it, they decide to travel through time to steal it from their older selves and bring harmony to the universe.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar (Cary Grant) sees fireworks with an American heiress (Grace Kelly) on the Riviera.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: A stranger (James Garner) tames an Old West boomtown and woos the mayor's daughter (Joan Hackett) on his way to Australia.

programme.title: The Krays, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Warped by their mother (Billie Whitelaw), cockney twins Ronald and Reginald Kray (Gary Kemp, Martin Kemp) become gangsters in 1950s London.

programme.title: Nerve, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Partnered with a mysterious stranger (Dave Franco), a high school senior (Emma Roberts) joins a popular online game that dares players to perform increasingly dangerous stunts.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: A hardened con with a history of prison breaks, is sent to serve the rest of his life sentence at Alcatraz, America's most infamously brutal and inescapable maximum security prison.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace (Mel Gibson) leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king (Patrick McGoohan) in the 13th century.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: The Peacemaker, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A scientist (Nicole Kidman) and an Army Special Forces colonel (George Clooney) travel the globe in pursuit of stolen nuclear weapons.

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: The town of Jefferson faces a mystery; how does a son murder his mother so brutally and die by suicide in such a seemingly impossible way?; as investigators uncover an obsession with Satan, whispers of demonic possession grow.

programme.title: Pocket Listing, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When a power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa, double crosses, adultery, murder and revenge ensue.

programme.title: Masterminds, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Past Lives, (2023, Romance)
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Crisis, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting one another.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer (Daniel Radcliffe) encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small town High School students, including an introverted photographer and a drug dealer, begin to suspect something's off with their teachers. They realize that the faculty is under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer (Daniel Radcliffe) encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism Part II, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Unable to remember the horrific events of her past, Nell Sweetzer (Ashley Bell) tries to rebuild her life in New Orleans. However, a demonic force soon returns with sinister plans for her.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting one another.

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: With their futures threatened by false accusations of cheating, three teenagers take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Good Boy, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sigrid thinks she's met the perfect match in Christian, but there's one catch: he lives with a man who acts like his pet dog. Trying to be open-minded, she continues the relationship but soon notices an insidious undertone to Christian.

programme.title: Wild Eyed and Wicked, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A woman tries to strike back at the medieval creature that's haunted her family for generations. To do so, she must learn how to draw upon a time of steel and blade when armor-clad knights rode out and dueled monsters to the death.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: A single woman (Jennifer Lopez) meets the man (Alex O'Loughlin) of her dreams on the same day she becomes pregnant through artificial insemination.

programme.title: Beneath, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Years after a car accident that disfigured an older sister, horrible visions, which come to pass , haunt the woman (Nora Zehetner) who was driving.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Hard Truths, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Pansy, angry and depressed, lashes out at family and strangers. Her constant criticism isolates her, except from her cheerful sister Chantelle, who remains sympathetic despite their differences.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: A single woman (Jennifer Lopez) meets the man (Alex O'Loughlin) of her dreams on the same day she becomes pregnant through artificial insemination.

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Vivica A. Fox) uses manipulative tactics to prove she has complete control over her boyfriend (Morris Chestnut).

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A business owner (Jim Broadbent) reunites with his first love (Charlotte Rampling) after a letter and a diary force him to confront the past.

programme.title: Burke & Hare, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two 19th-century opportunists (Simon Pegg, Andy Serkis) become serial killers so that they can maintain their profitable business supplying cadavers to an anatomist (Tom Wilkinson).

programme.title: Case 39, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: A social worker (Ren√©e Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: Wrong Turn, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life.

programme.title: Vindicta, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a city is terrorized by a sadistic serial killer, a seasoned detective and a newly recruited paramedic are forced into a deadly game of vengeance, only to discover the key to stopping the bloodshed lies in unlocking the truth of their own pasts.

programme.title: Dream Horse, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: The true story of Dream Alliance, an unlikely racehorse bred by bartender Jan Vokes. With very little money and no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream and compete with the racing elites.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Nothing Compares, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sin√©ad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: Irena's Vow, (2023, Docu-Drama)
programme.desc: Caught in a German roundup to be used as a slave laborer, Polish nurse Irena Gut becomes a German army major's housekeeper during World War II. Irena risks her life to conceal a dozen Jews within the major's home.

programme.title: The Assistant, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Jane is an aspiring film producer who lands her dream job as a junior assistant to a powerful entertainment mogul. But things soon take a dark turn when she becomes subjected to daily abuse and harassment in the workplace.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Movie queen Joan Crawford (Faye Dunaway) pampers and punishes her adopted son and daughter (Diana Scarwid).

programme.title: Frida, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: The Uninvited, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a man's new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: The Night Clerk, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: Irena's Vow, (2023, Docu-Drama)
programme.desc: Caught in a German roundup to be used as a slave laborer, Polish nurse Irena Gut becomes a German army major's housekeeper during World War II. Irena risks her life to conceal a dozen Jews within the major's home.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe, (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: When father and son coroners investigate the death of a beautiful "Jane Doe," they find increasingly bizarre clues.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Movie queen Joan Crawford (Faye Dunaway) pampers and punishes her adopted son and daughter (Diana Scarwid).

programme.title: The Kingmaker, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Lauren Greenfield examines the controversial history of Filipino politician Imelda Marcos and her family.

programme.title: India Sweets and Spices, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: After returning from college, young Alia upends her family's well-ordered life with her brash new independence. When secrets about her parents come to light during a dinner party, it soon pushes her to a daring and ultimately hilarious confrontation.

programme.title: Black Box Diaries, (2024, Documentary)
programme.desc: Journalist Shiori Ito conducts an investigation into her own sexual assault, aiming to bring the prominent perpetrator to justice. Her pursuit evolves into a significant legal case, revealing the antiquated judicial and societal frameworks in Japan.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: A plane passenger (Cillian Murphy) forcibly involves his seatmate (Rachel McAdams) in a plot to assassinate a government official.

programme.title: Captive, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warren's "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Monstrous, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: Love Me, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: A buoy and a satellite meet online long after humanity's extinction. As they learn what life was like on Earth, they discover themselves and what it means to be alive and in love.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small town High School students, including an introverted photographer and a drug dealer, begin to suspect something's off with their teachers. They realize that the faculty is under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites.

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Men reminisce about intriguing sisters, whose parents (James Woods, Kathleen Turner) quarantined them after one of the five killed herself.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Cracks, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Jealousy flares after the headmistress (Eva Green) of an elite boarding school for girls becomes obsessed with a new student (Mar√≠a Valverde).

programme.title: Mercy, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) pursues a romance with a critic (Wendy Glenn) who panned his work.

At one point in their cross-state journey, her abductor thought they would be able to flee to Mexico in a kayak, a plan that went completely awry.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".
programme.sub-title: The Girl in the Twin Towers

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime Feature Films)
programme.desc: 2029 ‚Äì A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" ‚Äì a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim‚Äôs memory.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: John Wayne: Guns Along The Trail, (1935, Western)
programme.desc: A government agent goes undercover in a traveling medicine show to infiltrate a gang of counterfeiters. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Flame Of Barbary Coast, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Pe√±a star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.desc: The entire school is possessed and drawn into the old schoolhouse, all to lure Satsuki and the gang into a trap. Lord Ohma has awoken, and seeks vengeance upon Satsuki for her family's past attempts to seal him.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Moving to a new town is tough on kids. Nothing is familiar, and with no friends, it can be scary. In Satsuki's case, that last part isn't helped any when she, her little brother, and three kids from school end up in the old schoolhouse.
programme.sub-title: Amanojaku: Tonight, the Spirits Will be Resurrected!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Something is stinking up the town, and it isn't just urban reconstruction! A ghost has invaded the school's bathrooms, and it's up to Satsuki and the gang to find out how to put it back to sleep.
programme.sub-title: Akagami Aogami: A Hand Reaches Out from the Toilet...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The big play is coming up, but the boy in the lead role is scared. He makes a wish for the gymnasium to catch fire--and it does. Then, when the play moves to being held in the old schoolhouse, the boy wishes to be injured--and he is!
programme.sub-title: The Curtain is Raised! The Cursed School Fine Arts Festival...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: While in the old schoolhouse, Satsuki hears a haunting melody drifting through the halls. The only trouble is the lack of a pianist! It seems that if Satsuki hears the melody a total of four times, she'll die.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The gang helps Keiichiro train for a sports festival at school. A mysterious boy shows up at the track, running alongside Keiichiro. Despite the bonding between the two, it seems the new boy isn't quite alive.
programme.sub-title: Datto!!: The Blood-Soaked School Sports Festival

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Stories spread about something preying on children who are all alone, and the gang gets scared. Especially since their parents will be out for the night! A deadly ghost with a sickle in hand stalks Satsuki and her friends. Can the gang survive the night?
programme.sub-title: Night of Tragedy: The Demon Hand That Tears Through Doors

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: People all over town begin acting strangely, but it isn't their fault, as most of them have been replaced by mirror-world clones of themselves!
programme.sub-title: Utsushimi: The Soul Stolen by the Mirror!
